StandardAgentFramework

Class AgentOnePhaseInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • StandardAgentFramework.AgentOnePhaseInformation

  • public class AgentOnePhaseInformation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents all the information that the environment has in a phase of the simulation: the agent object, its perceptions and the action decided.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AgentOnePhaseInformation(Agent agent, Perceptions perceptions, Action action) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Action getAction()
      Returns the action decided by the agent in the current phase.
      Agent getAgent()
      Returns the agent.
      Perceptions getPerceptions()
      Returns the perceptions sensed by the agent in the current phase.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
